mapper.insert: insert into members(id, nickname, pwd, email, language) values (#{id}, #{nickname}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{language})
mapper.select: select COUNT(id) from members where id= #{id}
select pwd from members where id = #{id}
select id from members where email = #{email}
select COUNT(*) from members where id = #{id} and email = #{email}
select * from members where id like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
